evidence.claim: Communicare+OLE uses AWS Lambda for serverless functions and Amazon RDS for database services.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards and uses HL7 FHIR for patient data exchange.
X12 EDI transaction sets are mentioned in the context of claims processing.
Real-time data integration is achieved through their webhooks and RESTful APIs.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 transactions and HIPAA compliance; fits target size and values API integration.
matched_use_cases: X12 EDI Transactions (270/271) for eligibility checks
837 Claims submissions and 835 Remittance advice processing
Clearinghouse capabilities for efficient data exchange
Integration of APIs for real-time provider and payer communication
